roleset.name: take as harvest
roleset.note: REAP-V NOTES: Member of Vncls remove-10.1. Comparison to 'obtain'. Checked by Julia, 10/2010. (from reap.01-v)

example.name: no received-from
example.text: The real battle is over who-1 *trace*-1 will control that market and reap its huge rewards.

example.name: with received-from
example.text: In a prepared statement, GM suggested its plans for Jaguar would be more valuable in the long run than the initial windfalls [0]-1 investors might reap *trace*-1 from a hostile Ford bid.
